text: Lars Petrus (1960 - Present) is a Sweedish Speedcuber. He invented the Petrus method of solving the Rubik's Cube. He became the Swedish national champion of speedcubing in 1982. He finished fourth place at the first official Rubik's Cube World Championships held in Budapest. ==Other websites== Official website Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish people
title: Lars Petrus
